title: Got demoted for a win in a game that was buggy as hell.
body: So i won a game that i left for 4 minutes because the game fucking crashed and i had to relog into the game. When i got back the healthbars wouldnt appear. Instead they would go down but i couldnt see them going down. I'm so happy that classic is out now.

replies.body: yea if you are afk for whatever reason, you get hit with a loss

You got demoted because you left for way too long, not because anything is buggy. Even if the game crashes, which should be extremely rare, you can relog and be back in-game in a  minute or two with no penalty.
